summary.para: Gets a collection of Outlook 365 calendars.

member.value: A collection of objects that correspond to Office365 calendars.

summary.para: Occurs once the calendar synchronization is complete (with or without errors).
Allows you to customize an event when the corresponding appointment is exported (or merged) to an Outlook 365 calendar.
Allows you to customize an appointment when the corresponding event is imported (or merged) from an Outlook 365 calendar.
Enables synchronization for all calendars in .

member.param: A string value that identifies a specific calendar in .
